section.title: Symbiosis
section.p: "Problem Solving" and "Learning" create a really good symbyosis. They can feed into each other effectively snowballing and making both processes better.

section.title: Learning "Problem Solving"
section.p: This is something that we already did in the previous chapter. But there's a lot more to it.
It helps to think "How can I solve Problems Better?"

section.title: Problem Solving "Learning"
section.p: We can see "what is the most effective way to learn" as a problem and apply our regular tactics.
